A DAY IN THE LIFE OF MICHAEL ROSENHEAD
The religion of my family is Judaism. We believe in only one god. We have many festivals including Pesach, Succot, Shevuot, Lag ta Omer, Rosh Hashana, Chanuka and Purim. We also have a special day every week which is called{SHABBAT. This is a day of rest. We rest on this day because it took God 6 days to create the world and on the 7th He rested. He named this day Shabbat. On Friday night we light candles and say a blessing when it is dark to bring in Shabbat. On Saturday morning we go to synagogue to pray. After, we have a kiddush (wine and snacks). In the afternoon we read a book or rest in the garden. We are not allowed to drive, cook, watch tv or play records. CONTINUED ON PAGE 6.
